channel.title: Newstart on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Newstart on Home

item.title: Welcome to the blog!
item.description: I’ll start posting tutorials on how to make a hugo theme quite soon, as I myself made this site using Hugo, and boy would it have been a treat to find out all I did during the process before I started it. About me then, I’m a eighteen year old obsessed with computers, currently pursuing a degree in CS (go figures) from the University of Calcutta. Love music and programming. Hate programming at the same time.
